achievement.description: Awarded for attaining the highest grade in Senior School
Awarded for attaining the highest grade in Mathematics in Higher Secondary School
Received other awards for sports, quiz competitions, cooking and spelling bee

skill_set.basic_skill: Basic skills in photo and video editing, along with the ability to use various Microsoft utilities such as MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Excel, MS Access, etc.
skill_set.proficient_skill: Highly proficient in programming languages such as C++, JAVA, Python and web - page development programming languages including HTML, CSS, XML, JAVAScript, etc. Also proficient in mathematics, design of algorithms as well as in SQL programming for databases.
skill_set.specialised_skill: Specialised in programming functional and apt solutions with JAVA and C++.

skill.description: Fluent in English as a spoken and written language
Works well in a team and very cooperative
Loves new challenges and admires learning new things
Handles pressure well, always motivated and determined to complete any task at hand

experience.description: Attended the AI camp conducted by Microsoft
Took part in the Duke of Edinburgh's Award, and thereby took part in various events that involved volunteering and charity

resume.personal_interest: Keeping aside the academics, I find enjoyment in other activities like travelling, watching and playing football, wrestling, cycling and badminton. Other interests include reading and cooking.
